events.message: I received the wrong size of the jacket I ordered and would like to request a refund for the item, as it does not fit and I do not want an exchange.
The customer's request concerns refund due to incorrect size delivery, categorized under Refund.
A support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect jacket size received by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to assist you with your refund request for the wrong jacket size.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging to proceed with the refund?
My order number is 54321, and yes, the jacket has never been worn and is still in the original sealed packaging.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund once you return the jacket. Please use the prepaid shipping label we will email to you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the prepaid label and look forward to resolving this soon.
The refund process has been set up. Once we receive the item back, your refund will be processed within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm if you have returned the jacket and whether you need any further assistance with the refund process.
Yes, I dropped off the jacket at the courier yesterday. Thanks again for the smooth support.
The refund has been processed successfully and the case is now closed. Please contact us if you need any further help.
